results.title: Simvastatin induces apoptosis in PTEN-haploinsufficient lipoma cells.

citations.NLM: Kässner F, Sauer T, Penke M, Richter S, Landgraf K, Körner A, Kiess W, Händel N, Garten A. Simvastatin induces apoptosis in PTEN-haploinsufficient lipoma cells. Int J Mol Med. 2018 Jun;41(6):3691-3698. PMID: 29568880

results.title: [New protective effect of simvastatin in rats with experimental steatohepatitis].
results.text_hl: Simultaneous injection of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (1 mg/kg, intragastrically) in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Ethanol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000431 @@@ethanol@@@--@CHEMICAL_Carbon_Tetrachloride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002251 @@@CCl4@@@ @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@hepatitis@@@ decreased @<m>DISEASE_Lipoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008067 @@@fatty dystrophy@@@ and produced certain anticytolytic and anticholestatic effects without potentiation of microsomal oxidation system damage by hepatotoxins.

citations.NLM: Okovityĭ SV, Arkad'eva AV, Bezborodkina NN, Sakuta GA, Iaroslavtsev MIu, Shulenin SN, Kudriavtsev BN. [New protective effect of simvastatin in rats with experimental steatohepatitis]. Eksp Klin Farmakol. 2007 May-Jun;70(3):43-5. PMID: 17650633
